1.0.name: wordpress/auto-tag-links
1.0.description:
Depending to your preferences, it will target only a few tags, depending to the content's length, the frequency the tags have been used, and randomly in the content.

Options provided:

  • Tag threshold and limit in a single post
  • Minimum and maximum tag links count
  • Custom link color

Italian and French translations provided.

Reference

Auto Tag Links is a free plugin developed by SEO Roma & PMI Servizi.

For more informations on this plugin: http://www.freeplugin.org/

New in latest releases

  • Polish translation by Aleksandra Czuba (www.iwasindira.com)

Credits

This plugin is partly based on previous work of (Anthony Dubois) Woodymood's Auto Link Best Tags plugin.
